code: @Test public void testAccept() throws Exception {     String out = template.requestBodyAndHeader("http://localhost:{{port}}/myaccept", null, "Accept", "application/myjson", String.class).     assertEquals("You called me as GET and accepted: application/myjson", out). }
public void configure() throws Exception {     from("jetty:http://localhost:{{port}}/myaccept").transform().simple("You called me as ${header.CamelHttpMethod} and accepted: ${header.Accept}"). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() throws Exception {             from("jetty:http://localhost:{{port}}/myaccept").transform().simple("You called me as ${header.CamelHttpMethod} and accepted: ${header.Accept}").         }     }. }
